fields.comment: used to be emit_real_particles - creates these particles in the grid, if that happens velocity and lifetime are ignored
fields.name: create_real_particles

fields.comment: this creates particles that will behave like particles, but work outside of the screen
fields.name: emit_real_particles

fields.comment: particle does have collisions, but no other physical interactions with the world. the particles are culled outside camera region
fields.name: emit_cosmetic_particles

fields.comment: cosmetic particles are created inside grid cells
fields.name: cosmetic_force_create

fields.comment: for cosmetic particles, if they are rendered on front or in the back...
fields.name: render_back

fields.comment: if 1, particles made of a glowing material will be 3x as bright as usually
fields.name: render_ultrabright

fields.comment: for cosmetic particles, if 1 the particles collide with grid and only exist in screen space
fields.name: collide_with_grid

fields.comment: does it collide with gas and fire, works with create_real_particles and raytraced images
fields.name: collide_with_gas_and_fire

fields.comment: for cosmetic particles, forces them (gas,fire) to be only 1 pixel wide
fields.name: particle_single_width

fields.comment: This is turned for potions after they take some damage and start leaking
fields.name: emit_only_if_there_is_space

fields.comment: emitter lifetime in frames. -1 = infinite
fields.name: emitter_lifetime_frames

fields.comment: if set, and fire cells are created, this changes their default behaviour of igniting DamageModels
fields.name: fire_cells_dont_ignite_damagemodel

fields.comment: if true, will get the particle color based on the world position (instead of randomizing it)
fields.name: color_is_based_on_pos

fields.comment: if >= 0, will use this as particle alpha
fields.name: custom_alpha

fields.comment: If > 0, the particles will be emitted inside a circular area defined by the min and max bounds of 'area_circle_radius'.
fields.name: area_circle_radius

fields.comment: if set, will make the velocity's rotation always away from center of randomized aabb
fields.name: velocity_always_away_from_center

fields.comment: If > 0, an attractor is created at the position of the entity that owns this component
fields.name: attractor_force

fields.comment: NONE or FIRE
fields.name: custom_style

fields.comment: if set will delay this many frames until starts
fields.name: delay_frames

fields.comment: if set, it'll use MaterialInventoryComponent as the source of the particles emitted
fields.name: use_material_inventory

fields.comment: if set, will do a trail based on the previous position and current position
fields.name: is_trail

fields.comment: if > 0, trail particles will be generated this far from each other between our old and new position, else [count_min-count_max] particles will be generated on the line
fields.name: trail_gap

fields.comment: if set, particle render positions will be snapped to cell grid
fields.name: render_on_grid

fields.comment: if set, particle's position in its lifetime will determine the rendering alpha
fields.name: fade_based_on_lifetime

fields.comment: if set, particle will rendered as a trail along it's movement vector
fields.name: draw_as_long

fields.comment: if 0 nothing happens, if 1 will apply a force to the physics body (if has one), also requires that we use the material inventory
fields.name: b2_force

fields.comment: if set will set the magic creation 1 in the cells and do the white glow effect
fields.name: set_magic_creation

fields.comment: file to use for image-based animation
fields.name: image_animation_file

fields.comment: file to use for image-based animation
fields.name: image_animation_colors_file

fields.comment: how long do we stay on one frame of image-based animation. 0.5 means two game frames per one animation frame. 2.0 means two animation frames per one game frame, and so on. 0 means we always emit at time 0 of the animation.
fields.name: image_animation_speed

fields.comment: does image-based animation keep looping while this component is active?
fields.name: image_animation_loop

fields.comment: the point in time [0,1] where the image-based animation will start the first cycle
fields.name: image_animation_phase

fields.comment: [0,1], probability of emitting image based particles is multiplied with this
fields.name: image_animation_emission_probability

fields.comment: enable this to disable image_animations (from the center) going through the world
fields.name: image_animation_raytrace_from_center

fields.comment: if 1, image animation emission will be rotated based on entity rotation
fields.name: image_animation_use_entity_rotation

fields.comment: if 1, mExPosition and m_last_emit_position will not be updated when receiving Message_TransformUpdated
fields.name: ignore_transform_updated_msg

fields.comment: is used with is_trail
fields.name: mExPosition

fields.comment: this is how we figure out the pressure, when using material_inventory
fields.name: mMaterialInventoryMax
